tariffs.title: Procedure for SME only
tariffs.description: Procedure only for small and medium enterprises in accordance with with Art. 3.4 of Federal Law No. 223
tariffs.price_comment: of the initial maximum price of the contract, but not exceeding 5,000 rubles (excluding VAT)
tariffs.extra_comment: Fee from a participant, with which a contract is concluded based on the procurement results (including participants that evade the conclusion of a contract)*. According to present tariff plan, the funds are debited from a special account

tariffs.title: Winner
tariffs.description: Participation in unlimited number of procurement procedures. The necessary amount should be on the account for debiting in case of winning
tariffs.price_comment: from the price of the application but not exceeding 75,000 rubles
tariffs.extra_comment: The amount is blocked on the account when submitting the application**

tariffs.title: Partner
tariffs.description: Participation in unlimited number of procurement procedures
tariffs.extra_comment: No fee from a winner of the procurement procedure

disclamer.text:
* Fee from a participant, with which a contract is concluded based on the procurement results (including participants that were considered by the Customer as evaders regarding conclusion of a contract). If a winner of the procurement procedure for SME only is evading the conclusion of a contract, the contract is concluding with another participant for free.

** The fee is charged for each lot within the framework of which the Participant was recognized as the winner of the procurement procedure.

items.title: Digital assistant
items.text: Useful services and services for the customer 223-FZ
